scripts.ast: tsc && node ast.js && npm run cleanjs
scripts.cleanjs: rm -rf src/complexity/old/enums/*.js && rm -rf src/complexity/old/interfaces/*.js && rm -rf src/complexity/old/mocks/*.js && rm -rf src/complexity/old/models/*.js && rm -rf src/complexity/old/services/*.js
scripts.conversion: tsc && node convert-ts.js && npm run cleanjs
scripts.cpx: npm run conversion && npm run ast
scripts.debug: tsc && node debug.js && npm run cleanjs
